opt_ray

PURPOSE

OPT_RAY - RAY creator for OPT_TOOLS

SYNOPSIS

function ray = opt_ray()

DESCRIPTION 

 OPT_RAY - RAY creator for OPT_TOOLS
 Creates a default ray structure  
   
 CAlling:
 ray = opt_ray()
 
 See also OPT_REFRACTION, OPT_TRACE
